Work

HackerEarth | Python / Django Engineering Intern

May 2015 - Present

Google Summer of Code | Student Developer

I built an online platform for the BRL-CAD Benchmark Suite to view and share a detailed analysis of a systems's performace. More details can be found on the project proposal here. The repository for development on Github.

Aircloak | Software Engineering Intern

AirCloak is a privacy focused product that provides anonymous data analytics. I built a tool to provide real-time anonymous geo-location analytics based on Aircloak's architecture.

Team AUV, IIT Kharagpur | Software Developer

Team AUV at IIT Kharagpur builds AUVs(Autonomous Underwater Vehicles) that take part in the annual AUVSI RoboSub competition in San Diego, California. I am a member of a team that designs and builds the Software Architecture for the vehicle.
